description: Asia-Pacific Regional Crisis Prevention and Recovery Project

subproject.description:
Output 1: Personnel from relevant regional and national organizations have the knowledge and skills in capacity assessment and capacity development strategies using conflict risk analysis and gender responsive assessment tools and methods. 
Output 2: Personnel from national and regional institutions have the knowledge and skills in conducting disaster risk assessment and in integrating conflict and disaster risk analysis  into national plans, strategies and budgets
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Regional Crisis Prevention

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description:
Output 1: Personnel from relevant regional and national organizations have the knowledge and skills in capacity assessment and capacity development strategies using conflict risk analysis and gender responsive assessment tools and methods. 
Output 2: Personnel from national and regional institutions have the knowledge and skills in conducting disaster risk assessment and in integrating conflict and disaster risk analysis  into national plans, strategies and budgets
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Regional Crisis Prevention

subproject.description: Output 3: Skills for formulating national capacity development projects and methodological strategy for economic recovery developed and disseminated to personnel from national institutions to guide programmatic direction for economic recovery in post-conflict/disaster situations.
subproject.title: Regional Post-Crisis Recovery

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacity to deliver improved justice and security, including safeguarding citizen security, in conflict-affected settings
subproject.description: Output 3: Skills for formulating national capacity development projects and methodological strategy for economic recovery developed and disseminated to personnel from national institutions to guide programmatic direction for economic recovery in post-conflict/disaster situations.
subproject.title: Regional Post-Crisis Recovery

title: Asia-Pacific Regional Crisis Prevention&Recovery Project
